text: 1.25 2 Ko 13.4 Binɨb lum awl mɨdebal okok, kɨli anɨgɨl gos nepal, God gos ne ogɨnap sawl sek mɨdeb. Pen gos ne ak mɨdupsek awl yɨbɨl teplep yɨbɨl mɨdeb, binɨb gos nɨgep kɨli ak sɨkol yɨbɨl gup. Pen kɨli abe gos nepal, God tɨtay gup okok, ogɨnap nɨŋɨd chɨn nopun, God kɨles ma mɨdeb. Pen kɨles ne ak mɨdupsek awl yɨbɨl mɨdeb, binɨb kɨles kɨli ak sɨkol yɨbɨl gup.
